sentences.en: But undeterred by Britton's revved up chainsaw, the lion pounced.
sentences.cn: 但是,在布里顿的电锯伤到狮子之前, 狮子就猛扑了上来.

sentences.en: Ditto credit : undeterred by souring quality, banks remain under pressure to lend.
sentences.cn: 放贷也可能抬头, 银行仍承受着放贷的压力,而并未因贷款质量恶化而收敛.

sentences.en: I see sprouting, crawling , flying life, undeterred by weather.
sentences.cn: 我看到风霜雨雪袭击下依然发芽 、 生长且充满勃勃生机的生命.

sentences.en: It was raining heavily but he set out undeterred.
sentences.cn: 雨下得很大,他仍不顾一切出发了.

sentences.en: Our troop advanced wave upon wave undeterred by the hail of fire.
sentences.cn: 我们的部队冒着猛烈的炮火前仆后继地前进.

sentences.en: They do not preach learning precepts , they preach, undeterred by particulars, the ancient law of life.
sentences.cn: 它们不宣讲学说, 它们不注意细枝末节, 只宣讲生命的原始法则.

sentences.en: Undeterred , Hollingshead put 30 blocks under the front wheels of all the cars.
sentences.cn: 郝林席德毫不气馁,在所有车子的前轮下安置了木块.

sentences.en: Undeterred, North Koreans keep on wading the Tumen River.
sentences.cn: 不过朝鲜人并未被吓阻,他们继续涉过图们江.

trans.tran_en: if you are undeterred by something, you do not allow it to stop you doing what you want
